A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a very different film from Force Awakens. That movie was fun but didn’t have much depth. This movie has more depth and the stakes are higher\, but it’s just not as fun to watch. I enjoyed the film far more upon my second viewing. I knew what to expect so I got to enjoy seeing the film instead of hoping for a scene inside my head. Character choices made more sense\, mysteries from TFA didn’t matter as much\, and the emotional beats made the story more impactful. I think over time people will enjoy the film for what it is and what it sets up for Episode IX.
